name: JOANN Teacher Discount
description: 15% off all purchases for verified educators
fullDescription: JOANN offers teachers 15% off total purchase every day with valid teacher ID in-store or through online verification.
whatTheyOffer:
- 15% off total purchase
- Applies to fabric, craft supplies, art materials
- Available in-store and online
- Stackable with some coupons
- Year-round discount
howToGetIt:
1. In-store: Show valid teacher ID at checkout
2. Online: Verify teacher status through ID.me
3. K-12 teachers, homeschool parents eligible
4. Childcare workers and professors also qualify
5. Discount applied at checkout
keywords: JOANN, teacher discount, educator, 15% off, craft supplies, fabric, classroom, art
